name: Golden Turmeric Roasted Cauliflower with Raita
description: Turmeric Roasted Cauliflower with Raita Dip. These Delicious Golden Cauliflower Bites are easy and quick. Serve with a dash of lemon or with a Yogurt onion dip or Green Chutney. Vegan Soyfree Nutfree Recipe. Can be gluten-free
recipeIngredient: 1  medium head of cauliflower, chopped into small florets
1 tsp lemon juice or lime juice
1 tsp garam masala or use curry powder of choice
1/2 tsp cayenne or use 1 tsp sweet paprika + pinches of cayenne to taste
a good dash of black pepper
pinches of cinnamon and clove powder (, optional)
1.5 to 2 tbsp panko breadcrumbs (Â  use gluten free breadcrumbs or coarsely crushed oats or 2 tsp rice flour to make gluten-free)
raita (see note), chutney or lemon to serve with

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the cauliflower into florets and add to a large bowl. Drizzle oil and lemon juice.  Mix and rub the oil and lemon juice into the florets.
recipeInstructions.name: Slice the cauliflower into florets and add to a large bowl. Drizzle oil and lemon juice.  Mix and rub the oil and lemon juice into the florets.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the spices and breadcrumbs in a bowl. Sprinkle all over the cauliflower and toss well to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the spices and breadcrumbs in a bowl. Sprinkle all over the cauliflower and toss well to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread on parchment lined baking sheet or large dish and spray oil on the florets.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread on parchment lined baking sheet or large dish and spray oil on the florets.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 425 degrees F (220 deg C) for 20 minutes, then reduce heat to 400 degrees F. Turn the sheet around or move the cauliflower around a bit and bake for another 10 to 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 425 degrees F (220 deg C) for 20 minutes, then reduce heat to 400 degrees F. Turn the sheet around or move the cauliflower around a bit and bake for another 10 to 15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the raita dip (see notes), or cilantro mint chutney, chimichurri. Serve as is with dips or with some spiced up beans/chickpeas on the side, or make tacos or wraps.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the raita dip (see notes), or cilantro mint chutney, chimichurri. Serve as is with dips or with some spiced up beans/chickpeas on the side, or make tacos or wraps.

keywords: golden cauliflower, spiced roasted cauliflower, vegan raita
